contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox shopping mall | shopping_mall_name = Eastgate | image = | image_width = | caption = | location = [[Bedfordview]], [[Johannesburg]], [[South Africa]] | coordinates = {{coord|26|10|47|S|28|6|59|E|type:landmark|display=title,inline}} | address = 43 Bradford Road, Bedfordview, Johannesburg | opening_date = | closing_date = | developer = | manager = [[Liberty Holdings Limited|Liberty Properties]] | owner = [[Liberty Holdings Limited]] | architect = | number_of_stores = | number_of_anchors = | floor_area = | parking = | floors = | website = {{URL|http://www.eastgate-shops.co.za}} | belowstyle = | footnotes = }} {{advert|date=January 2012}} {{Refimprove|date=December 2008}} Eastgate was [[Johannesburg]]s first 'super-regional' [[shopping centre]]. When it opened in 1979, it was the largest shopping centre in the [[southern hemisphere]]. It remains one of the largest centres in the country, and is the second-largest shopping centre in the [[Greater Johannesburg Metropolitan Area]], after [[Sandton City]] The centre lies next to the [[R24 (Gauteng)|R24]] airport freeway, between the Johannesburg CBD and [[Johannesburg International Airport]]. Stores include [[Woolworths (South Africa)|Woolworths]], Edgars, [[Checkers_(supermarket_chain)|Checkers]] Hyper, [[Ster-Kinekor]] cinemas, Dion and Stuttafords. A R300 Million expansion was completed in 2010, which brings Eastgate to 122 000mÂ². It is owned and developed by Liberty Life. It is managed by Liberty Properties, on behalf of the parent company Liberty Life. Eastgate Shopping Centre is frequented by over 80 000 shoppers on Saturdays, over 2 million shoppers a month. Eastgate Shopping Centre offers [[Bureau de change]] facilities. Major retailers include one of the most successful Woolworths in South Africa. The centre's 250 stores include over 60 fashion boutiques and 13 jewellers. ==External links== *[http://www.eastgateshopping.co.za/ www.eastgateshopping.co.za] {{Johannesburg-geo-stub}} {{SouthAfrica-struct-stub}} [[Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1979]] [[Category:Shopping centres in Johannesburg]] [[Category:Shopping malls established in 1979]]
